title: Jacket
description: open front with white frog fastener; neckband is batik circle pattern with pink center; batik sleeves with pink and yellow accents; front and shoulders have woven strips which also carry pink accents; back tail woven and/or embroidered strips of geometric designs separated by appliqued strips; top back woven or embroidered in pink, yellow, white, red geometric designs
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
